column4: I have just bought a mini-pci Orinoco card and can't get it to talk to talk to my router.. any idea what could be wrong? I also have a PCMCIA Orinoco working fine
It isn't Davicom based by any chance ?
Sorry, can't help. I was having weird issues with a Davicom card and from time to time some chap comes in here with similar problems :)
